--- Christoph Spielmann <spielc@...> wrote:

> Hi everybody!
> 
> I've got another question (i know... again ;)):
> 
> If i understood it correctly everytime a exception
> during the crawl is thrown, the crawler waits for a
> given time before he continues the crawl. The
> problem
> is that it waits for about 15 minutes or something
> like it, that's ways to long in my eyes... Now my
> question is, where the setting for the duration of
> the
> timeout can be found and (hopefully) changed (if
> there
> is a setting for it at all...)
> 
Hmm i just remarked that i was wrong because i had a
queue snoozing but it still continued to crawl (i
guess it just stopped crawling last time cuz there was
nothing else to do...) but there's still a question
open: How is the "sleep time" calculated for a
snoozing queue cuz this time it snoozed for a few
seconds?
